resources.string:
Set in North Nicosia, AA+ REZİDANCE features a garden, casino, terrace, and free WiFi. All rooms feature a kitchen and a private bathroom. All rooms are equipped with a balcony with city views.
The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a microwave, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.
Nicosia is 8 km from the motel, while Kyrenia is 21 km away. The nearest airport is Ercan Airport, 24 km from AA+ REZİDANCE.
